sentences: Zoran Predin (born 16 June 1958) is a Slovenian singer-songwriter from Maribor.
In the 1980s, he was the front man of the folk-rock band Lačni Franz.
In the late 1990s and early 2000s, he went on several tours with the rock singers Pero Lovšin and Vlado Kreslin.
Among others, they composed the anthem of the Slovenia national football team for the 2000 European Football Championship.
